statements: DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1 AND first_name = 'John';
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
DELETE FROM CustomerProfile WHERE customer_id = 1 AND phone_number = '1234567890';
DELETE FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerProfile WHERE name LIKE 'John%');
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND state = 'California';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date <= '2022-01-31' AND total_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND amount < 50.00;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND total_price > 100.00
